slide.title: Static Cache
slide.subtitle: Configuration
slide.example:
[CacheSettings] HostName=localhost MaxCacheDepth=4
CachedURLArray[] CachedURLArray[]=/news* CachedURLArray[]=/weblog*
CachedSiteAccesses[] CachedSiteAccesses[]=news_en CachedSiteAccesses[]=news_fr
AlwaysUpdateArray[] AlwaysUpdateArray[]=/

list.bullet: ~CachedURLArray~: Which URLs should be statically cached
~CachedSiteAccesses~: For which site accesses should we cache
~AlwaysUpdateArray~: Which nodes should always have it's static cache regenerated when publishing content
